basicInfo.name: Freyja
basicInfo.flavor: Ancient monsters began wreaking havoc in the heavens, and a long war broke out in the Celestial Realm. In order to protect the peace, Freyja personally led the army into battle.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 50% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Noble Storm
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of Defense Reduction equal to the number of buffs removed. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 67% of Magic Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 75% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.

Skill 2.name: Golden Rain
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Divinity] to change HP Alteration to 39%.
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 70% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP Alteration to 39%.
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Magnificent Authority
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 160% of the caster's Magic Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Divinity upon using any attack 1 time(s). [Max 6 Stack(s)]
 - All Allies
 - If deployed to a team with 3 or more Magic heroes, grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Blessing cap becomes 25% of Max HP.
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 37%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Grants 4 stack(s) of Divinity. [Max 6 Stack(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Her pet cat, order, strength, decisiveness, caviar, wine
profile.dislikes: Taesa, Mist, unsanitary conditions, chaos, weakness, passive people
profile.story: Ancient monsters began wreaking havoc in the heavens, and a long war broke out in the Celestial Realm. In order to protect the peace, Freyja personally led the army into battle.

basicInfo.name: Freyja
basicInfo.flavor: Freyja became the leader of [Einherjar], the most powerful military faction among the Valkyries. With her impeccable character, exceptional intelligence, and immense strength, she has the respect of all Valkyries.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Noble Storm
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of Defense Reduction equal to the number of buffs removed. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 52% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Golden Rain
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Divinity] to change HP Alteration to 58%.
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 62% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Magnificent Authority
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 145% of the caster's Magic Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Divinity upon using any attack 1 time(s). [Max 6 Stack(s)]
 - All Allies
 - If deployed to a team with 3 or more Magic heroes, grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]

profile.story: Freyja became the leader of [Einherjar], the most powerful military faction among the Valkyries. With her impeccable character, exceptional intelligence, and immense strength, she has the respect of all Valkyries.

basicInfo.name: Freyja
basicInfo.flavor: Freyja was born with the noblest bloodline among the all of the valkyries. Once a compassionate pacifist, she is known as the most beautiful and kind-hearted noblewoman, beloved by all.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).

 - Deals damage equal to 47% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果

All Enemies

 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
